name: The Legend of Nudacus
description:
The Legend of Nüdacus

Run, tackle, and dodge as Nüdacus, the butt-naked hero. 

Face off in a coliseum of fierce warriors with no equipment other than brute strength and agility.  Tackle your opponents into arena traps, lure your foes into each other's lines of fire, and streak across a  coliseum with pride and dignity.

Created for Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam Theme: Start with nothing

We took the idea of start with nothing very seriously. 

Twitter: @dummydojo

Instagram: @dummydojo
